greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Row sums of the matrix ((1,xc(x))^2 mod 2), where c(x) is the g.f. of A000108.
comment: (1,xc(x)) is the Riordan array T(n,k)=[x^n](xc(x))^k. Conjectures: a(2^n)=a(2^(n+1)+1)=A005578(n);a(2^n-1)=a(3*2^n-1)=1.
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Oct 07 2005
